scenes.background: Bob looks frustrated, pacing around the office as Monica types away at her computer.
scenes.description: 'This is getting out of hand. We need more than just a quick check-in from you. Can you commit some more time?'

options.text: I understand the urgency. I can allocate more time, but only for this task.
options.analysis: You showed strong empathy and social skills by offering more time, but your self-regulation and motivation to maintain your leave were slightly lower.

options.text: I can only help intermittently. You need to handle most of it.
options.analysis: You balanced your time off with a willingness to help, showing good self-regulation, but your motivation and empathy were not particularly high.

options.text: I think you both need to manage this without my full involvement. Follow the plan.
options.analysis: You maintained strong self-regulation by maintaining your boundaries, but your perception, empathy, and motivation to help were lower.
